items.name: Equipment
items.entry: A dice set, brewer's supplies, a flask filled with your favorite booze, a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 15 gp

entries.name: Feature: Social Lubricant
entries: You have no trouble finding and getting into places that serve drinks. While drinking in a social establishment, strangers take a liking to you and feel comfortable enough to share gossip.

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: A barkeep's demeanor ranges from jovial to downright rude. Regardless, all barkeeps know how to take care of business - they break up fights, refer drunk patrons to the bouncer, and offer honest counsel to people down on their luck.

rows: I'm always looking for a good time with good company.
I earnestly enjoy offering advice.
I'm everyone's outlet, but sometimes I just want to punch them in their thoughless faces.
I know how to calm people down, but I also know how to rile them up.
It's not all fun and games. Business needs to run smoothly, no matter what that might be.
I understand that sometimes a little bit of flirting goes a long way.
Drinking on the job is never a problem.
If you're looking for a fight, I'll give you one.
Kindness. Service with a smile is everyone's right. (Good)
Guidance. It's our duty to help others. (Lawful)
Work Ethic. Hard day's work for a hard day's pay. (Neutral)
Self-Betterment. I'm working to be the best I can be. (Any)
Loose Change. The drunk make easy money for stealing. (Evil)
Legacy. We only have one chance to write our story. Do what you will and make it count. (Chaotic)
The regulars keep money in my pocket and food on my table; they're like family.
My employer saved me from a horrible fate. I want to repay him properly.
Brewing is my craft. My art brings people together.
I want to be successful. Whatever it takes..
Alcohol is all I need, and sometimes all I want.
I've met so many people while staying in the same place. I need my own story to tell.
I judge people that don't trink to be antisocial and untrustworthy.
I need to know everyone's story.
I'm willing to try anything to have a good time.
I am a perfect example for why you shouldn't sample your own product.
I can never turn down a chance to gamble.
My bar was raided, which has led to a natural distrust of authority figures.
